verbose_text: Regarding the endocytosis pathway, XREF_BIBR have shown that the overexpression of pathogenic mutant LRRK2 delays endosomal trafficking of the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) by decreasing Rab7 activity mediated late endosomal budding.
evidence: overexpression of pathogenic mutant LRRK2 delays endosomal trafficking of the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) by decreasing Rab7
